casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 23, 2013

[Cite as 12/23/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-5631.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2012-2041. Columbus City Schools Bd. of Edn. v. Franklin Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2010-K-1655. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals.

Upon consideration of the agreed motion to remand the appeal to the Board of Tax Appeals, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and this case is remanded to the Board of Tax Appeals so that the board may take further action as appropriate.
